sessions.name: Leading via Transformation
sessions.description: The changing landscape of higher education is progressing at lighting speed; causing colleges and universities to re-imagine themselves. This session is designed to assist those who are responsible for leading change during this transformative period; navigate through and thrive during this time of uncertainty, challenge and opportunity.

sessions.name: Effective Communication
sessions.description: Communication is paramount when an organization is transforming from its current state and practices.  This workshop focuses on addressing communication challenges, communicating for all stakeholders and supporting change through effective communication.

sessions.name: Leading via Transformation

sessions.name: Effective Communication

sessions.name: FERPA
sessions.description: Learn the basics of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act.

sessions.name: Progressive Discipline
sessions.description: Progressive discipline should be used by managers to provide notice to employees who are not meeting expected or communicated job performance standards.  Learn how to effectively use a progressive discipline system that will assist you with correcting employee performance problems.

sessions.name: Travel/P.O. Policy
sessions.description: Mobile devices and browsers are now advanced enough that developers can build native-quality mobile apps using open web technologies like HTML5, Javascript, and CSS. In this talk, we’ll provide background on why and how we created Ionic, the design decisions made as we integrated Ionic with Angular, and the performance considerations for mobile platforms that our team had to overcome. We’ll also review new and upcoming Ionic features, and talk about the hidden powers and benefits of combining mobile app development and Angular.

sessions.name: Emergency Response
sessions.description: An active shooter situation can occur anywhere, anytime, by anyone.  Being aware of what to do and/or how to respond can save your life.

sessions.name: Generation Z
sessions.description: Mobile devices and browsers are now advanced enough that developers can build native-quality mobile apps using open web technologies like HTML5, Javascript, and CSS. In this talk, we’ll provide background on why and how we created Ionic, the design decisions made as we integrated Ionic with Angular, and the performance considerations for mobile platforms that our team had to overcome. We’ll also review new and upcoming Ionic features, and talk about the hidden powers and benefits of combining mobile app development and Angular.

sessions.name: Work Life Balance
sessions.description: We spend more time at work than with any of the people we love, take care of, or live with.  Sometimes our jobs… our careers… take over.  Worse case, we may negatively affect our health and well-being.  However, balancing everything we have to do is a lot more simple than we think it is. Let’s get you back on track to manage your work life, have more time for your personal life, and help you avoid the “stress” issues that too many of us are affected by.

sessions.name: Diversity (Cultural Differences)
sessions.description: Fostering a diverse and inclusive campus community – This interactive session will review institutional nondiscrimination and anti-harassment policies and procedures, discuss unconscious or implicit biases, and provide information on preventing and addressing discrimination and harassment in the workplace.
